column2: BRIEF-Aptargroup Inc Says CEO Stephan Tanda's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $7.9 Mln March 27 (Reuters) - Aptargroup Inc: * APTARGROUP INC SAYS CEO STEPHAN TANDAâ€™S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $7.9 MILLION VERSUS $8.0 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * APTARGROUP INC SAYS FOR 2019, CEO PAY RATIO ESTIMATED TO BE 172 TO 1 Source text : (bit.ly/2wGxZIb) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Aptar Adds Capabilities To Better Serve The Growing Color Cosmetics Market Acquires Reboul May 2 (Reuters) - Aptargroup Inc: * APTAR ADDS CAPABILITIES TO BETTER SERVE THE GROWING COLOR COSMETICS MARKET; ACQUIRES REBOUL, AN ESTABLISHED AND INNOVATIVE LEADER IN PRESTIGE BEAUTY PACKAGING * APTARGROUP INC - AS OF MAY 1, 2018, IT HAS ACQUIRED REBOUL FROM VACHERON INDUSTRIES SAS * APTARGROUP INC - DEAL FOR AN ENTERPRISE VALUE OF EUR 14 MILLION (APPROXIMATELY $17 MILLION) IN CASH, LESS AMOUNT OF NET DEBT ASSUMED AT CLOSING DATE * APTARGROUP - AGREEMENT ALSO PROVIDES AN EARN-OUT PROVISION BASED ON 2018 RESULTS, WHICH COULD INCREASE ENTERPRISE VALUE TO A MAXIMUM OF EUR 23 MILLION * APTARGROUP INC - PURCHASE WILL BE FUNDED WITH AVAILABLE CASH ON HAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Aptar Aptargroup Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.92 April 26 (Reuters) - Aptargroup Inc: * APTAR REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS; DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.99 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.93 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FOR Q2 OF 2018, EXPECT CONTINUED CORE SALES GROWTH OVER PRIOR YEAR IN EACH BUSINESS SEGMENT * EXPECTS EARNINGS PER SHARE FOR Q2 TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.99 TO $1.04, EXCLUDING ANY COSTS RELATED TO OUR BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.02 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET SALES $ 703.35 MILLION VERSUS $ 601.32 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
